Chicken Inasal

Chicken Inasal is a popular Filipino dish made from marinated chicken pieces, usually with a
combination of vinegar, soy sauce, calamansi juice, garlic, ginger, lemongrass, and annatto oil.
The chicken is then grilled or barbecued over hot coals, giving it a slightly smoky flavor and
crispy texture on the outside while remaining juicy and flavorful on the inside.
It is often served with a side of steamed rice and a dipping sauce made from vinegar,
soy sauce, and chili peppers.

Ingredients

    Set A
  • - 1 Kilo Chicken Leg Quarter Fillets
  • - 3 Tablespoons Fish Sauce
  • - 2 Tablespoons Soy Sauce
  • - 1 Tablespoon Brown Sugar
  • - 1/2 cup Datu Puti Sukang Sinamak
  • - 2 cloves garlic
  • - Black pepper to taste
  • - 1 Stalk Tanglad

    • Set B
  • - Chicken Trimmings
  • - 1 Stalk Tanglad
  • - Oil
  • - 4 Cloves Garlic
  • - 3 Pieces Laurel Leaves
  • - Whole Peppercorns
